item.title: Coding Challenges
item.description: Insights, Techniques, Concepts, etc 238:Product of Array Except Self Here we come up with an approach by solving 2 simpler problems and combining them: get the product of all elements preceding the current element, and those succeeding the current element. Common Errors and Mistakes

item.title: The Art & Craft of Problem Solving
item.description: These are my notes as I work through the book, The Art & Craft of Problem Solving (Zeitz 2017). From the preface, it seems like there will be a lot of problems to work through. In that case, Iâ€™ll prefer to work on paper. However, any definitions, insights, and other thoughts will appear here. 1. What This Book Is About and How to Read It 1.1 Problems vs Exercises.
